select m.id id ,m.title title,content, m.start_time start_time, m.end_time end_time, m.status status, m.room_id room_id, mode,host_id,recorder_id,note, h.user_name hostName, r.user_name recorderName,mr.name roomName from t_meeting m, t_meeting_room mr,t_user h,t_user r where m.room_id=mr.id and h.user_id = m.host_id and r.user_id = m.recorder_id and m.id= #{meetingId}
